::: {#hero-heading}
I am an Associate Research Fellow at the Housing & Urban Finance Research Institute of the Housing & Urban Guarantee Corporation (HUG). With a Ph.D. in Urban Planning from UNIST, I specialize in utilizing Big Data, AI, and Spatial Econometrics to address urban and financial challenges.

My particular areas of interest are:

-   Urban Analytics & Spatial Econometrics
-   Big Data & AI (NLP, LLM)
-   Housing Finance & Regional Policy

I use this site to showcase my recent work, and discuss new data-science and statistical tools and techniques on my blog.
